issue.subject: Restriction on WMS/WFS versions within policies
issue.description:
A nice to have functionnality would be to give the option for the admin to define for a given policy which version(s) of a WMS or WFS could be requested by users.

For example :
- a policy would give the right to user A to access WMS_X in 1.1.1 and 1.3.0 versions.
- another policy would give the right to user B to access only the WMS_X in version 1.1.1

journals.notes:
Hi Xavier,

Is this feature still relevant.
I don't see specific use cases and may be you can describe here some of.
Normally OGC clients have to bind with the upper version offered by OGC servers (version that they are able to support).

Thanks,

You are right... the issue is old and was written when OGC clients were not as mature as now.

You can reject it.
